questions.question_text: A user wants to reduce the amount of paper consumed on a multi-function printer. Which of the following settings should be configured to achieve this outcome?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
en imprimant sur les deux faces du papiers, la rame entiere ne sera qu'utiliser que de moitié. donc qu'il configure duplexe dans les impression
B. it's printing on both sides of page. less paper

Selected Answer: C
qu'il procede a une defragmentation d'abord. si le pc supporte le upgrade du OS

questions.question_text:
A technician upgrades an older computer to Windows 8. The computer is running unusually slow, but the hardware has no problems and is adequate for the OS.
Which of the following is the MOST likely solution?
Which of the following types of expansion slots is MOST frequently found in blade servers?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
PCIe pour une ahute transmission des données

A. PCIe 
Blade servers typically use PCIe slots because of their high-speed data transfer capabilities which is crucial for server performance, as well as scalability.

questions.question_text: A user wants to extend a PC’s capacity by connecting external devices. Which of the following connectors will allow the user to accomplish this? (Select TWO).

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
La mémoire SODIMM (D. SODIMM) est spécifiquement conçue pour les ordinateurs portables en raison de sa taille compacte
